item.title: Trump says Israeli hostages should be released "Monday or Tuesday"
item.description: Trump says Hamas will likely release all Israeli hostages by early next week, as the "first phase" of a deal to end the war in Gaza is expected to tak...

item.title: Arturo Gatti Jr., son of late boxing champion, dies at age 17
item.description: Gatti Jr. was 10 months old when his father, who was a world champion in two weight classes, died at age 37 in July 2009.

item.title: Endangered ferrets in more jeopardy as government shutdown drags on
item.description: With biologists from the U.S. Fish and Wildlife Service furloughed because of the shutdown, a critical release of 400 captive-bred ferrets is at risk.

item.title: Judge ruling on National Guard lawsuit filed by Illinois, Chicago today
item.description: A judge is set to rule on a lawsuit filed by Illinois and Chicago seeking to prevent the National Guard from being deployed by the federal government ...

item.title: Dominion Voting Systems acquired by St. Louis-based Liberty Vote
item.description: The acquisition brings together two major players providing key infrastructure for voting and voter verification systems across dozens of states ahead...
